author: Brian Turner
method: Mix the pepper pieces, chopped herbs, mozzarella and olives in a bowl to combine. Lay the tortilla wrap flat and spoon the pepper mixture on top. Roll up the tortilla and secure with a cocktail stick. Heat the oil in a small pan on medium heat. Brush the tortilla with the beaten egg and then gently fry, until golden on both sides. Remove from the heat, transfer to a plate and serve.
ingredients: ½ pepper, chopped,  4 tbsp chopped mixed fresh herbs (parsley, chives, basil),  40g/1½oz mozzarella, torn into small pieces,  30g/1oz black olives, pits removed,  1 tortilla wrap,  1 tsp olive oil, for frying,  1 free-range egg, beaten
